title: Estimates of the population for the UK, England and Wales, Scotland and Northern Ireland
description: National and subnational mid-year population estimates for the UK and its constituent countries by administrative area, age and sex (including components of population change, median age and population density).
datasetNotes: On the landing page under your download options click on the latest release
sizingNotes: Simple table structure with footnotes although the structure varies from tab to tab
notes: Although not strictly Covid-19 it has been used in a publication by ONS where do people over 70 live and local and regional estimates of those aged over 70 years
